忘記登入帳號 / 密碼？
歡迎使用 Red Hat Network

trans-unit.source: Red Hat Network is the premier service for maintaining your Enterprise's Linux infrastructure. Below are some links that should prove useful if you have any questions regarding your Satellite server or further questions about RHN.
trans-unit.target: Red Hat Network 是您維護 Enterprise Linux 架構的最佳服務。如果您有任何衛星伺服器服務、或 RHN 的進一步問題，以下一些連結對您會有所幫助。

trans-unit.source: The latest Satellite release notes are available.
trans-unit.target: 最新的衛星伺服器《發行公告》。

trans-unit.source: For support, please visit our support web site at http://www.redhat.com/apps/support.
trans-unit.target: 需要任何支援，請參閱我們的支援網站 http://www.redhat.com/apps/support。

trans-unit.source: To add entitlements to your existing Satellite Certificate, or for more information about RHN products and services, please call your salesperson or contact Sales at 1-866-273-3428 x45606.
trans-unit.target: 要為您現有的衛星伺服器認證增加權利，或需要更多關於 RHN 產品與服務的訊息，請連絡您的業務代表，或透過電話 1-886-273-3428 x45606 連絡業務人員。

trans-unit.source: Red Hat Network is a complete systems management platform for Linux. It's built on open standards and uses a simple, Internet-based graphical interface. It also features a modular design--as networks grow, administrators can add enhanced capabilities for system updates, management, and monitoring of their entire infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Red Hat Network 是 Linux 的完整系統管理平台。它架構於開放式標準，使用簡單、以網際網路為基礎的圖形界面。它也支援模組化的設計：當網路持續成長，管理者能對整個架構做系統更新、管理、以及監控等動作。

trans-unit.source: Red Hat currently features three Red Hat Network modules:
trans-unit.target: Red Hat 目前提供三個 Red Hat Network 模組：

trans-unit.source: Update: Easy software updates to your Red Hat systems.
trans-unit.target: 升級：輕鬆升級的您的 Red Hat 系統。

trans-unit.source: Management: Increased management capabilities and scalability of your Linux deployment.
trans-unit.target: 管理：為建置 Linux 提供更精進的管理功能與可擴充性。

trans-unit.source: Provisioning: System snapshots, integrated kickstarts, configuration management and more.
trans-unit.target: Provisioning：系統快照、整合的 kickstarts、設定管理等等。
了解 RHN 的更多資訊

trans-unit.source: Note: If you are having SSL connection issues when connecting to Red Hat Network, ensure that you are using the latest versions of up2date (Enterprise Linux 4 and below) or yum (Enterprise Linux 5 and higher) and rhn_register.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果您在連接 Red Hat Network 時，有 SSL 連線的問題，請確定您使用的是 最新版 的 up2date（RHEL 4 以下）或 yum（RHEL5 以上）與 rhn_register。

trans-unit.source: RHN offers email notifications for when errata relevant to your systems are released, as well as daily emails summarizing the events for your systems.
trans-unit.target: RHN 會在與您系統相關的勘誤釋出時，以電子郵件通知您；或以日報表電子郵件提醒您。

trans-unit.source: This controls how many entries, like systems, would be displayed per page in a list context.
trans-unit.target: 跟系統一樣，這會控制每頁清單中會列出多少項目。

trans-unit.source: A task-oriented menu of quick links to different areas of the RHN user interface.

trans-unit.source: You can select one or more default system groups for this user. When the user registers a system, that system will be assigned to the selected group or groups. This allows the user to have access to the newly-registered system immediately, if he or she has permissions to one or more of the groups the system is assigned to. System Groups to which this user has access to are preceded by a (*).

trans-unit.source:
The Demo entitlement is a free system entitlement that was granted with each new Red Hat Network (RHN) account. The Demo system entitlement is only intended to be used when subscribing an Red Hat Linux (end of life) system to RHN. Red Hat Linux maintenance and errata support ended April 30, 2004. Red Hat no longer grants Demo system entitlements to new RHN accounts.

The Demo Entitlement can not be used with Red Hat Enterprise Linux will be removed at a later date. Inactive systems associated with the Demo entitlements will be unentitled. An inactive system is a system that uses a Demo entitlement but has not checked in the past 30 days.
trans-unit.target:
示範（Demo）權利是免費的系統權利，授與每個新的 Red Hat Network（RHN）帳號使用。示範權利只是用來向 RHN 訂閱 Red Hat Network 系統用。Red Hat Linux 的維護與勘誤支援已經在 2004 年四月卅日到期。Red Hat 不再為新的 RHN 帳號授與新的示範權利。

無法應用於 Red Hat Enterprise Linux 的示範權利將在之後被移除掉。 與這示範權利相關的非運作中系統之所有權利也將被移除。非運作中的系統是指使用示範權利，但在過去卅天內沒有登入的系統。

RHN 衛星伺服器設定 - 組織

trans-unit.source: The RHN Satellite must be restarted to reflect these changes.
trans-unit.target: RHN 衛星伺服器必須重新啟動，以反映這些變更。

trans-unit.source: Configure your RHN Satellite below. The HTTP proxy settings are for the Satellite server's communication with the parent RHN server, if any. The http proxy should be of the form: hostname:port, but a default port of 8080 will be used if none is provided. HTTP proxy settings for clients' systems to connect to this Satellite can be different, and will be configured later. If you enable the Monitoring Backend, you should also enable Monitoring Scout, or configure the Monitoring Scout as a separate server. If you enable the Monitoring Scout, you must also enable the Monitoring Backend.
trans-unit.target: 請在下方設定您的 RHN 衛星伺服器。HTTP 代理設定是給衛星伺服器與父 RHN 伺服器通訊用（如果使用這情況的話）。HTTP 代理必須使用「主機：連接埠」格式，但如果您不設定連接埠的話，系統會使用預設的 8080。用戶端系統連上這衛星伺服器上的 HTTP 代理設定可以不同，也可以在稍後設定。如果您啟用了「監控後端」，您也應該啟用「監控偵測」，或設定「監控偵測」為一台獨立的伺服器。如果您啟用這功能，您也必須啟用「監控後端」。

trans-unit.source: Red Hat Network Satellite allows for the creation of multiple 'organizations' on a Satellite.
trans-unit.target: Red Hat Network 衛星伺服器能讓您在一台衛星伺服器上建立多個「 組織」。

trans-unit.source: Organizations are a way to place boundaries between sets of systems, system groups, software channels, subscriptions and entitlements, kickstart profiles, activation keys, configuration channels and files, users - everything you manage using Satellite. Each organization is managed by at least one organization administrator, and the entire Satellite is managed by a Satellite administrator. The organizations on one Satellite with multiple organizations function similarly to the organizations on multiple Satellites with one organization.
trans-unit.target: 組織是設定系統、系統群組、軟體頻道、訂閱與權利、kickstart 設定檔、啟動金鑰、設定頻道與檔案、使用者界線的地方：您可以用衛星來管理任何東西。每個組織都由至少一個組織管理員所管理，整個衛星伺服器是由一名衛星管理者所管理。一台擁有多個組織功能的衛星上的組織，跟擁有一個組織的多台衛星伺服器上的組織相仿。

trans-unit.source: To get started creating and managing organizations on your Satellite, refer to the following tabs in the left navigation menu:
trans-unit.target: 要開始建立、管理您衛星伺服器上的組織，請參考左方導覽列的分頁：

trans-unit.source: For more details on organizations, please refer to the
trans-unit.target: 欲知更多關於組織的詳情，請參閱

trans-unit.source: Manage the subscriptions on your Satellite. You may also look up what access is provided by each entitlement. On a per-entitlement basis, you can allocate entitlements for any particular entitlement across all organizations on your Satellite here as well.
trans-unit.target: 管理您衛星伺服氣上的訂閱服務。您也可以檢閱每個權利所提供的存取功能。 在單一權利的基礎上，您也可以在此為任何衛星上得所有組織，分配特定的權 利。

trans-unit.source: Create and manage organizations on your Satellite. On a per-organization basis, you can also allocate software subscription and system entitlements here.
trans-unit.target: 建立並管理衛星伺服氣上的組織。在單一組織的基礎上，您也可以在此分配軟體訂閱與系統權利。

trans-unit.source: Create and manage organizations on your Satellite. You can not view all of the users on the Satellite here, but you can look up the users with organization administrator privileges in all of the organizations on your Satellite and you may also assign or take away an organization administrator's satellite administrator privileges.
trans-unit.target: 建立並管理衛星伺服器上的組織。您無法在此檢視衛星伺服器上的所有用戶，但您 可以透過組織管理者的權限，尋找衛星伺服器上整個組織的使用者，並指定或移除 組織管理者的衛星管理者權限。

trans-unit.source:
The following information will be used to generate bootstrap scripts. These bootstrap scripts can be used to configure a client to use this RHN Satellite to receive updates. Once the bootstrap scripts have been generated, they will be available from this server.

Please note that some manual configuration of these scripts may still be required. The bootstrap script can be found on the RHN Satellite Server's filesystem here: /var/www/html/pub/bootstrap
trans-unit.target:
以下資訊會被用來產生 bootstrap 程序檔。這些 bootstrap 程序檔可以用來設定用戶端，以利用這台 RHN 衛星伺服器取得升級。一旦這 bootstrap 程序檔產生後，就可以從這台伺服器上找到。

請注意您還是需要手動設定這些程序檔的某些部份。bootstrap 程序檔可以在 RHN 衛星伺服器的檔案系統中找到：/var/www/html/pub/bootstrap

trans-unit.source: The configuration changes require a restart of the Satellite. Please click Restart to restart the Satellite. This page will auto refresh in 4 minutes. Be aware that this will affect all users logged into this application as well as systems attempting to register or interact with the Satellite.
trans-unit.target: 要讓改變後的設定生效，您必須重新啟動衛星伺服器。請選擇「重新取動」來重新啟動衛星伺服器。此網頁會在四分鐘內更新。 請注意這會影響所有登入這應用程式的使用者，以及試著向衛星伺服器註冊或與之互動的系統。

trans-unit.source: The Organization Default Profile setting can be used with manually-created or bare-metal kickstart files. Select this option to indicate which profile in your Organization is used when the URL from this link is specified in the ks=<URL> section of your kickstart file. The link will not work unless an Organization Default is specified.
trans-unit.target: 「組織預設設定檔」的設定可以與手動建立或空機的 kickstart 檔案一起使用。請選擇這個選項，指出當這個連結在 kickstart 檔案的 ks=<URL> 段落中，要用哪一個設定檔。這連結只有在組織預設值指定後才會發生作用。

trans-unit.source: You cannot kickstart a system registered to Satellite using an inactive kickstart profile. However, the kickstart files for inactive kickstart profiles are still available for manual download and may be used for bare metal kickstarts.
trans-unit.target: 您不能透過非作用中的 kickstart 設定檔，kickstart 已向衛星伺服器的系統。然而，非作用中的 kickstart 設定檔的 kickstart 檔案還是可以用作手動下載，以及空機 kickstart。

trans-unit.source: You may specify scripts to run during the kickstart process, either before (pre-kickstart) or after (post-kickstart) the operating system installation starts. These scripts are useful for tasks such as setting up NFS mounts, moving files before installation, turning services on, or adding users after installation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定 kickstart 進行時要執行的程序檔，時間可以是 kickstart 安裝作業系統之前或之後。這些程序檔對一些工作，例如掛載 NFS、在安裝前移動檔案、啟動服務、或在安裝之後新增使用者等等，會非常有用。

trans-unit.source: You may view or edit the scripts for this kickstart below. You may add a new script using the add new kickstart script button above to the right.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在下方檢視或編輯這個 kickstart。您可以使用右下方的按鈕，增加新的 kickstart 程序。

trans-unit.source: No scripts are associated with this kickstart profile
trans-unit.target: 沒有與這個 kickstart 設定檔相關連的程序檔

trans-unit.source:
In order to kickstart "bare metal systems", you will need to provide them with a boot image that is compatible with the version of the operating system you are kickstarting to via boot CD.

Once these systems have booted using the appropriate image, you will need to provide a kickstart file. You may use the following URL in your Boot CD or in your PXE configuration to provide these systems with the kickstart file associated with this kickstart profile:
trans-unit.target:
為了要 kickstart「全新的系統」，您需要提供一份開機映像檔，相容於您透過開機光碟所 kickstart 的版本。

一旦這些系統使用正確的映像檔啟動後，您還需要提供 kickstart 檔案。您可以使用您開機光碟或 PXE 設定中的以下網址，為這些系統提供與這 kickstart 設定檔相關的 kickstart 檔案：

trans-unit.source: Resource: The RHN Reference Guide Kickstart section

trans-unit.source: You may wish to modify the following options for special-case kickstart scenarios. We recommend consulting the Red Hat Enterprise Linux System Administration Guide for detailed documentation of all of these options.
trans-unit.target: 您可以為特定的 kickstart 環境，修改以下選項。我們建議您參考《Red Hat Enterprise Linux 系統管理指南》，其中包含了所有這些選項的詳細文件。

trans-unit.source: Tip: The label field should not be easily guessable, since it could be used to expose information about this kickstart profile to a 3rd party.
trans-unit.target: 提示：這標籤欄位不應該被容易猜出來，因為它會曝露關於本設定檔的資訊給第三方。

trans-unit.source: You can associate one or more activation keys with this kickstart profile. Activation keys will allow systems kickstarted with this profile to automatically register to RHN, gain RHN service level entitlements, subscribe to specified software and configuration channels, and subscribe to specified system groups. Activation keys can also specify packages to be installed on a system. Please consider how this may affect your package selection in this profile's Software tab.
trans-unit.target: 您可以為這個 kickstart 設定檔設定一或多個啟動金鑰。啟動金鑰能讓利用這設定檔 kickstart 的系統，自動向 RHN 註冊，取得 RHN 服務等級的權利、訂閱特定的軟體並設定頻道、同時訂閱特定的系統群組。啟動金鑰也可以指定要安裝到系統的套件。請在設定檔的軟體分頁中，看看這將會如何影響您的套件管理。

trans-unit.source: Note: The selection of incompatible activation keys can prevent a system from registering properly after it is kickstarted. You'll want to review the RHN Reference Guide section on using multiple activation keys before making use of this feature.
trans-unit.target: 注意：選擇不相容的啟動金鑰會讓系統在 kickstart 之後，無法正確地註冊。您可以在使用這功能之前，檢視《RHN 參考指南》中有關使用多啟動金鑰一節。

trans-unit.source: Warning: Any child channel subscriptions associated with this profile will be overridden if any activation keys are selected above. If you wish to associate activation keys with this profile, please use an activation key to specify child channel subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: 警告： 假如選擇了上述任何的啟動金鑰，任何與此設定檔相關的子頻道訂閱都會被置換掉。 假如您希望使啟動金鑰與此設定檔相聯，請使用一組啟動金鑰來指定子頻道訂閱。

trans-unit.source: You can associate file preservation lists with this kickstart profile by selecting them below. When a system is kickstarted, any files or directories listed in the file preservation lists associated with this kickstart profile will be saved before the kickstart is performed and restored once it is complete. If you would like to create a new file preservation list, you can do so at the File Preservation tab.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在下方選擇，為檔案保留清單與 kickstart 設定檔建立關聯。當系統被 kickstart 時，檔案保留清單中，跟這個設定檔有關的所有檔案與目錄，都會在 kickstart 開始前備份，並在 kickstart 完成後復原。如果您想要建立新的檔案保留清單，請點選檔案保留分頁。
以 IP 位址來 kickstart 全新的系統
為網路介面使用靜態 IP 位址
啟用 - 強制使用 SELinux 政策

trans-unit.source: Permissive - SELinux prints warnings instead of enforcing
trans-unit.target: 警告 - SELinux 會印出警告，而不是強制使用政策
停用 - 完全停用 SELinux

trans-unit.source: Tip: Enabling this will allow you to deploy configuration files from RHN to any system that uses this kickstart profile. If you do not use RHN configuration management, it is a good security practice to leave this box unchecked. You can always enable it on individual systems later.
trans-unit.target: 提示：啟用這功能可以讓您從 RHN 將設定檔發佈到任何使用這 kickstart 設定檔的系統上。就安全性來說，如果您不使用 RHN 設定管理，建議您不要勾選這個方塊。您可以在之後於每台電腦上，啟用這功能。

trans-unit.source: Tip: Enabling this will allow you to execute commands remotely from RHN on any system that uses this profile. It is a good security practice to leave this box unchecked unless you are sure you will use the remote command feature. You can always enable it on individual systems later.
trans-unit.target: 提示：啟用這項功能可以讓您在任何使用這設定檔的系統上，從 RHN 執行遠端指令。就安全性來說，如果您不使用 RHN 設定管理，建議您不要勾選這個方塊。您可以在之後於每台電腦上，啟用這功能。

trans-unit.source: A root password must be entered

trans-unit.source: You can refer to these keys and/or certificates in your kickstart profiles in order to install those keys/certificates on systems during a kickstart. A system will need the correct keys to install signed packages, and correct certificate to be kickstarted by an RHN Proxy Server or RHN Satellite Server. For more information, see the RHN Reference Guide
trans-unit.target: 您可以在 kickstart 設定檔中，參照這些金鑰與（或）認證，好在 kickstart 過程中，安裝這些金鑰 / 認證。系統需要正確的金鑰，來安裝經過數位簽章的套件，並修正透過 RHN 代理伺服器或 RHN 衛星伺服器來安裝的 kickstart 認證。欲知更多詳情，請參閱《RHN 參考指南》。

trans-unit.source:
You can edit the pre and post scripts for this kickstart below. Kickstart pre-scripts are run immediately after a kickstart file has been parsed on a system. You can access the network in this section, but you must use IP addresses (name service has not been configured at this point). For more details on kickstart pre scripts, please refer to the Red Hat Enterprise Linux System Administration Guide.

You can also edit the post script for this kickstart below. First, commands related to RHN will automatically be performed (for example, esystem registration to RHN). Next, the non-chroot post script will be executed, and finally the post script will be executed. For more details on kickstart post scripts, please refer to the Red Hat Enterprise Linux System Administration Guide.
trans-unit.target:
您可以在以下編輯這 kickstart 的 pre 與 post 描述檔。Kickstart pre 描述檔會在 kickstart 設定檔由系統解讀後，馬上執行。 您可以使用這一節來存取網路，但您必須使用 IP 位址（此時名稱解析服務還沒被設定）。欲知 kickstart 中 pre 一節的設定，請參閱《Red Hat Enterprise Linux 系統管理指南》。

您也可以在下方編輯 kickstart 的 post 描述檔。首先，與 RHN 有關的指令會自動執行（舉例來說，向 RHN 註冊系統）。 接下來，非 chroot 的 post 描述檔會被執行，最後則是 post 描述檔。欲知更多 kickstart post 描述檔的詳情，請參閱《Red Hat Enterprise Linux 系統管理指南》。
Kickstart 程序檔的描述式語言

trans-unit.source: Tip: Leave this field blank to use the install-time shell as language for your post script.
trans-unit.target: 提示：將這欄位留白，可以使用安裝時的主控台，作為您 post 描述檔的語言。

trans-unit.source: Tip: This specifies when the script gets ran (before or after kickstart).
trans-unit.target: 提示：這會指定程序檔的執行時間（kickstart 之前或之後）。

trans-unit.source: You can edit the post script for this kickstart below. First, commands related to RHN will automatically be performed (for example, esystem registration to RHN). Next, the non-chroot post script will be executed, and finally the post script will be executed. For more details on kickstart post scripts, please refer to the Red Hat Enterprise Linux System Administration Guide.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在下方編輯 post 程序。首先，與 RHN 相關的指令會自動執行（舉例來說，使用 esystem 向 RHN 註冊）。接下來，非 chroot 的 post 程序會執行，最後是 post 程序。欲知更多 kickstart post 程序的詳細資料，請參閱《Red Hat Enterprise Linux 系統管理指南》。

trans-unit.source: Tip: This script is run in the chroot environment.

trans-unit.source: "Non-chroot" post-kickstart scripts are run outside of the chroot environment. You can use them to perform tasks that aren't allowed in chroot environments, such as copying scripts or RPMs from installation media.
trans-unit.target: 「非 chroot」post-kickstart 描述檔會在非 chroot 環境中運行。您可以用此來進行一些不允許在 chroot 環境中的工作，例如從安裝媒介複製描述檔或 RPM 檔。

trans-unit.source: Modifying the following options is often useful to troubleshoot hardware problems:

trans-unit.source: The ELILO bootloader is required for IA-64 systems.
trans-unit.target: ELILO 開機啟動程式只能在 IA-64 系統上運作。

trans-unit.source: LILO is a text-based bootloader. Choose LILO as your bootloader if you are having video card issues.
trans-unit.target: LILO 是文字介面的開機啟動程式。如果您有顯示卡方面的問題，請選擇 LILO 為您的開機啟動程式。
額外的 kernel 參數（只對應於自動的 kickstart）

trans-unit.source: You can modify the following options to specify Locale options:
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改以下選項，指定「地區」選項：
步驟一：建立 Kickstart 設定檔

trans-unit.source: A kickstart file is a simple text file containing a list of items, each identified by a keyword, that answers the questions an installer needs in order to successfully install Red Hat Enterprise Linux. A kickstart profile includes a kickstart file, as well as other saved options such as the version of Red Hat Enterprise Linux to be installed and the location of the installation files.
trans-unit.target: Kickstart 檔案是個簡單的文字檔，包含多個項目，每一行都以一個關鍵字標出，用來回答安裝程式的問題，好成功地安裝 Red Hat Enterprise Linux。Kickstart 設定檔包含了 kickstart 檔案，以及其他儲存選項，例如要安裝的 Red Hat Enterprise Linux 版本，以及安裝檔案的位置。

trans-unit.source: Tip: To associate Child software channels with this profile, Please visit the Software > Child Channels tab after you finish these profile creation steps.
trans-unit.target: 提示：如要將子軟體頻道和此設定檔相聯，請在您完成這些設定檔建立步驟後參閱軟體 > 子頻道分頁。

trans-unit.source: In order to install Red Hat Enterprise Linux during kickstart, the Red Hat Enterprise Linux installation files must be available to the kickstarting system via network connection. You can make these available either via http or ftp.
trans-unit.target: 要在 kickstart 期間安裝 Red Hat Enterprise Linux，使用 kickstart 的系統必須能透過網路，下載 Red Hat Enterprise Linux 的安裝檔案。這可以透過 http 或 ftp 通訊協定來達成。

trans-unit.source: The kickstart profile will need to have a root password for the system(s) to be kickstarted in order to complete the kickstart process.
trans-unit.target: Kickstart 設定檔需要系統的 root 密碼，才可以進行 kickstart 以完成整個過程。

trans-unit.source: Activation Keys are used to register systems. Systems registered with an activation key will inherit the characteristics defined by that key.
trans-unit.target: 啟動金鑰是用來註冊系統用。藉由啟動金鑰註冊的系統會承襲該金鑰所定義的特性。

trans-unit.source: Leave blank for automatic key generation. Note that the prefix is an indication of the Satellite organization the key is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 要自動產生金鑰，請留白。請注意前綴表示的是與這金鑰相關的衛星組織。

trans-unit.source: Choose "{0}" to allow systems to register to the default Red Hat provided channel that corresponds to their installed version of Red Hat Enterprise Linux. You may also choose particular Red Hat provided channels or custom base channels here, but please note if a system using this key is not compatible with the selected channel, it will fall back to its Red Hat default channel.
trans-unit.target: 請選擇「{0}」好讓系統註冊預設的、Red Hat 所提供的、同時與所安裝的 Red Hat Enterprise Linux 版本相對應的頻道。您也可以在此選擇特定的、Red Hat 所提供的頻道或自訂頻道，但請注意，如果一台使用這金鑰的系統並不與所選的頻道相容，它將會回到預設的 Red Hat 頻道。

trans-unit.source: Only one universal default activation key may be set for this organization. By setting this key as universal default, you will remove universal default status from the current universal default key if it exists. If this key is set as universal default, then newly-registered systems to your organization will inherit the properties of this key.
trans-unit.target: 只有一組通用的預設啟動金鑰可以給這個組織拿來設定用。將這金鑰設定為通用預設金鑰，會移除目前（如果有的話）通用預設金鑰的狀態。如果這金鑰設定為通用預設值，那麼您組織的新產生系統將會繼承這金鑰的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you modify the key itself above, please note that the key will be prepended with a '{0}'. This is to identify the organization with which the key is associated and is associated with the Satellite's multiple organizations feature.
trans-unit.target: 如果您直接修改了以上金鑰，請注意這金鑰的前方會加上「{0}」。這是用來辨認組織是與哪一組金鑰相關聯，並與衛星的多個組織功能相關聯用的。

trans-unit.source: Are you certain you want to delete this key? Activation Keys cannot be recovered once they have been deleted. (Note: A key can be disabled on the key list page, which prevents it from being used, but preserves it for later use.)
trans-unit.target: 確定要刪除這金鑰嗎？啟動金鑰一旦被刪除，就無法還原。（請注意：金鑰可以在金鑰清單頁停用，以防止被人使用，但又可以保留以待日後他用。）

trans-unit.source:
The following configuration files are associated with the systems in this set. You can select files and compare the RHN-managed versions of the files to the versions of the files on the systems in your set.

The comparisons for each system will not complete until each system checks in to RHN. Once each comparison is complete, any differences between the files will be accessible from each system's events page.

下列配置檔案與此叢集中的系統相聯。您能夠選擇檔案，並拿這些檔案的 RHN 管理之版本與您叢集中的版本做比較。

直到各個系統登錄至 RHN 中，各個系統之間的比較才能完成。一旦所有的比較都完成時，檔案之間的任何差異就能由各個系統中的事件頁面中存取。

trans-unit.source: Rank the new configuration channel subscriptions. Configuration files in channels appearing higher in the list will override configuration files with the same path in lower channels. Choose a channel in the list and then use the up and down arrows to change its priority. Also select what priority the configuration channels listed here will have in relation to current configuration channel subscriptions for each system.
trans-unit.target: 將新的配置頻道訂閱分等。等級較高的頻道中的配置檔案會將相同路徑不過位於等級較低的頻道中的配置檔案置換掉。請於清單中選擇一個頻道然後使用上下鍵來更改它的優先權。同時請選擇列在此的配置頻道擁有的優先權和各個系統目前訂閱的配置頻道有何關係。

trans-unit.source: The systems listed below do not have files managed via RHN configuration management. For systems to be capable of being managed by RHN configuration management, they will need a provisioning entitlement in addition to having particular rhncfg-* packages installed. You can enable configuration management on the systems listed below. Note: nothing will happen to already enabled systems.

trans-unit.source: The configuration channels listed below are those selected configuration channels to which {0} is subscribed. trans-unit.source: Below is a list of centrally-managed configuration files associated with {0}. Centrally-managed configuration files are provided by global configuration channels - you can determine which channel provides which file by examining the "Provided By" column below. Some of these centrally-managed files may be overridden by locally-managed files - you can determine whether or not a file is overridden by examining the "Overridden By" column below.
trans-unit.target: 以下是個與 {0} 相關的中央管理的配置檔案之清單。中央管理的配置檔案是由全域配置頻道所提供的 - 您能夠藉由檢查下方的「由...所提供」欄位來決定哪個頻道提供哪個檔案。有些這些中央管理的檔案會被本地管理的檔案置換掉 - 您能夠藉由檢查下方的「由...所置換」欄位來決定檔案是否應被置換。

trans-unit.source: Locally-managed configuration files are useful for overriding centrally-managed configuration profiles that cause problems on particular systems. Also, locally-managed configuration files are a method by which system group administrators who don't have configuration administration privileges can manage configuration files on the machines they are able to manage.
trans-unit.target: 本地管理的配置檔案對於置換某些系統上會出問題的中央管理配置設定檔相當有用。還有，本地管理的配置檔案是個「當系統群組管理員沒有配置管理權限時，卻能夠在他們所能管理的機器上管理配置檔」的一種方法。

trans-unit.source:
The following details are needed to define a kickstartable distribution. The External Location field should be a valid URL to the base of the distribution tree. The Kickstart RPM should be the name of the rpm containing the kickstart deploy scripts. These RPMs are provided by RHN and located in the RHN Tools child channels.

The Distribution Label field should contain only letters, numbers, hyphens, periods, and underscores. It must also be at least 4 characters long.

The External Location, Kickstart RPM, Base Channel, and Installer Generation should always match. This generally means that the versions for each field should be from the same version of Red Hat Enterprise Linux.
trans-unit.target:
定義可 kickstart 的散佈版本時，需要以下詳細資料。「外部位置」欄位應該是該散佈樹的有效位址。Kickstart RPM 應是包含著 kickstart 佈署 script 的 rpm 名稱。這些 RPM 檔案都由 RHN 所提供，並位於「RHN 工具」子頻道中。

「散佈標籤」欄位僅能包含文數字、減號、句號與底線，同時至少包含四個字元。

「外部位置」、「kickstart RPM」、「基礎頻道」與「安裝程式產生器」應該保持一致。這通常表示每個欄位的版本應該來自相同的 Red Hat Enterprise Linux 版本。

trans-unit.source: Red Hat Logins and Red Hat Network
trans-unit.target: Red Hat 登入帳號與 Red Hat Network

trans-unit.source: Red Hat Network provides Red Hat subscription customers with software downloads, updates, security errata, and systems management capabilities. To access these Red Hat Network benefits, customers must log in to Red Hat Network using a Red Hat login associated with at least one active subscription to a Red Hat product or service.
trans-unit.target: Red Hat Network 提供 Red Hat 訂閱用戶軟體 下載、更新、安全性勘誤、與系統管理 之能力。要存取這些 Red Hat Network 的好處，用戶必須 使用 Red Hat 登入帳號（這帳號必須與至少 一份啟用中的訂閱服務或產品關聯）來登入 Red Hat Network。

trans-unit.source: Want to see a demo of Red Hat Network?

trans-unit.source: Ready to purchase a Red Hat subscription?

trans-unit.source: Visit the Red Hat Store or contact your valued Red Hat reseller. If you do not have a Red Hat login, you will be guided through Red Hat login creation during your purchase.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 Red Hat 線上商店，或 聯絡您的 Red Hat 經銷商。如果您沒有 Red Hat 登入帳號，在您購買的過程中， 我們會引領您建立帳號。

trans-unit.source: Red Hat logins are associated with valid, active subscriptions either at purchase time or during the activation of a subscription number. Please determine how you Red Hat subscription was fulfilled to determine the best way to get access to Red Hat Network below.
trans-unit.target: Red Hat 登入帳號會與有效、啟用中的訂閱服務相連結； 這訂閱服務是在購買時、或啟動訂閱號碼時啟用的。 請決定您的 Red Hat 服務等級，以決定 以下最適用的 Red Hat Network 存取方式。

If you do not have a Red Hat login, you will be guided through Red Hat login creation during activation. If you forgot your Red Hat login, please complete our lost login form to recover it.

Red Hat Network 停機政策

trans-unit.source: Our highest priority is your access to Red Hat Network and the advantages of a registered account. We strive to maintain 100% uptime for your RHN service, but must also periodically perform maintenance tasks to upgrade functionality, fix reported bugs, and improve performance.
trans-unit.target: 我們的首要目標是讓您存取 Red Hat Network，以享用註冊用戶專屬的好處。 我們希望能提供您廿四小時的 RHN 服務，但我們還是得進行定期維護，以升級 一些功能、修正錯誤、並改進效能。

trans-unit.source: Red Hat schedules all planned maintenance to Red Hat Network each Tuesday from 9pm-3am, Eastern U.S. Time (1am-7am UTC). While Red Hat will not necessarily use every one of these windows to perform maintenance, we recommend that your enterprise develop business practices that allow this period of downtime for your RHN solution. Red Hat will always attempt to inform at least one week in advance through the email outage list (see below) about this scheduled downtime whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: Red Hat 會在美東時間的周二 晚間九點至隔日凌晨三點（凌晨一點至凌晨七點 UTC）對 Red Hat Network 進行維護。但 Red Hat 不一定會每週都進行維護； 但我們建議您在設計 RHN 相關時程時，避開這個時段。 Red Hat 會盡可能提前一週寄出電子郵件（如下），通知您 RHN 的站務維護時間。

trans-unit.source: Unscheduled maintenance windows are possible, but rare. Red Hat Network will attempt notification, again through the email outage list (see below), at least 12 hours or as soon as possible in advance of unscheduled maintenance.
trans-unit.target: 您可能會遇到未排程的維護時段；但這很罕見。Red Hat Network 會儘可能提前十二小時，以電子郵件通知您這些未排程的維護時段。

trans-unit.source: When failing equipment or any other critical issue forces an outage, Red Hat will open a trouble ticket on the outage and contact all users on the email outage list as soon as possible.
trans-unit.target: 當裝備問題或其他重大事故發生，導致必須停機時，Red Hat 會紀錄、追蹤此項停機事 件，並立即透過停機電子郵件清單，與所有使用者聯絡。

trans-unit.source: All RHN users are encouraged to join our optional email outage list. This email list will provide you with periodic updates about our scheduled downtime maintenance activities, and will also serve as the emailing list that Red Hat will use in the case of Unscheduled and Emergency Maintenance windows.Register for the Email Outage List.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議所有的 RHN 使用者加入我們的停機電子郵件清單（選用）。這清單會定期 提供您停機維護活動，並做為非計劃與緊急維護事件的聯絡窗口。 請按此註冊停機電子郵件清單。

下載以及使用 ISO 映像檔

trans-unit.source:
It is recommended that you use curl to download the ISO images. If you use RHN and don't currently have curl, you may install it by running the command "up2date curl" (Enterprise Linux 4 and below) or "yum curl" (Enterprise Linux 5 and above) from a shell prompt.

Once curl is installed, at a shell prompt, cut and paste the URL for the ISO into the curl command as follows:

[user@localhost home]$ curl -C - -O 'very_long_url'

Use the following curl command to save the ISO as 'myfilename.iso':

[user@localhost home]$ curl -C - -o 'myfilename.iso' 'very_long_url'

The URL is very long because it contains session authentication information. Be sure to include the single quotation marks. The '-C -' option allows you to continue the download if it is interrupted (for example, in case you lose the connection). The '-O' (the letter 'O', not a zero) option will save the file with same name as on the RHN servers.

You may also use wget to obtain the ISO files. If you use RHN and don't currently have wget, you may install it by running "up2date wget" (Enterprise Linux 4 and below) or "yum wget" (Enterprise Linux 5 and above) from your command line.

Once wget is installed, at a shell prompt, cut and paste the URL for the ISO into the wget command as follows:

[user@localhost home]$ wget -c 'very_long_url'

For more information on how to use Red Hat ISOs, check the How To Download page.
trans-unit.target:
我們建議您使用 curl 來下載映像檔。假如您使用 RHN 但是目前沒有 curl 的話，您能夠藉由從 shell 提示執行「uda2date curl」（RHEL 4 以下）或「yum curl」（RHEL 5 以上）這項指令來安裝它。

一旦 curl 被安裝以後，請將 ISO 的 URL 剪下並貼至 shell 提示中的 curl 指令，就像是：

[user@localhost home]$ curl -C - -O 'very_long_url'

請使用下列 curl 指令來將 ISO 儲存為「myfilename.iso」：

[user@localhost home]$ curl -C - -o 'myfilename.iso' 'very_long_url'

URL 非常長因為它包含著 session 認證資訊。請確認您有加入單獨的引號。「-C -」這個選項能讓您在傳輸中斷時（比方說您斷線時）繼續下載。「-O」（是字母 O 不是零）這個選項能夠將檔案儲存為與 RHN 伺服器上相同的名稱。

您也許會想要使用 wget 來取得 ISO 檔案。如果您使用 RHN 並且目前沒有 wget 的話，您能夠藉由從您的指令列執行「up2date wget」（RHEL 4 以下）或「yum wget」（RHEL 5 以上）來安裝它。

一旦 wget 被安裝以後，請將 ISO 的 URL 剪下並貼至 shell 提示中的 wget 指令，就像是：

[user@localhost home]$ wget -c 'very_long_url'

如要取得更多有關於如何使用 Red Hat ISO 的資訊，請查閱 如何下載的頁面。

trans-unit.source: There are two types of channel content ISOs: Base Channel Content ISOs and Incremental Channel Content ISOs. You will want to download Base Channel Content ISOs if you need to initially populate a new Satellite with channel content. Alternatively, you will want to download Incremental Channel Content ISOs if you want to update channels that you have already imported into your Satellite.
trans-unit.target: 有兩種頻道內容 ISO：基礎頻道 ISO 與遞增頻道內容 ISO。 假如您一開始需要將一個新的衛星伺服器集結於頻道內容，您會想要下載基礎頻道內容的 ISO。 另外地，如果您希望更新您已匯入衛星伺服器中的頻道，您就會想要下載遞增頻道內容的 ISO。

trans-unit.source:
As a Channel Administrator, you may change the base channels your systems are subscribed to. Valid channels are either channels created by your organization, or the default Red Hat base channel for your operating system version and processor type. Systems will be unsubscribed from all channels, and subscribed to their new base channels.

This operation can have a dramatic effect on the packages and errata available to the systems, and should be used with caution.
trans-unit.target:
身為頻道管理員，您可以改變系統所訂閱的基礎頻道。合於規定的平到是您組織所建立的頻道，或是與您的作業系統版本與處理器類型相符預設的 Red Hat 基礎頻道。系統將取消訂閱所有頻道，然後訂閱新的基礎頻道。

這動作會對系統上的套件與勘誤有著巨大的影響，請小心使用。

trans-unit.source: Below is a summary of the errata you have selected to clone. Contained in each CSV download is a list of errata and packages respectively that will be pushed to the channel.
trans-unit.target: 以下是您選擇要複製的勘誤摘要。每個下載的 CSV 檔案包括勘誤與套件的清單，用以推送至頻道中。

trans-unit.source: Below is a list of errata that can pushed to the current channel. Use the channel selection drop down filter to narrow down errata to choose from.
trans-unit.target: 以下是可以推送到目前頻道的勘誤清單。請使用選擇頻道過濾的下拉式選單，縮小要選擇的勘誤範圍。

trans-unit.source: Below is a list of errata that can pushed to the current channel. Use the drop down filters to narrow down which errata you may choose from.
trans-unit.target: 以下是可以推送到目前頻道的勘誤清單。請使用下拉式選單，縮小要選擇的勘誤範圍。

trans-unit.source: (Recommended) With this selected only errata that contain packages that apply to this channel are shown. Also, package architecture will match what is currently in the channel.
trans-unit.target: （建議）只選擇顯示適用於此頻道的套件。同時，套件架構會與目前此頻道中的相符。

trans-unit.source: No patch sets associated with this channel.
trans-unit.target: 沒有更新套件組與這頻道相關。

trans-unit.source: The following patchsets are in this channel. To add a patchset to this channel, click 'add' above.
trans-unit.target: 以下升級組位於此頻道。要將升級組加入此頻道，請按上方的「新增」。
列出頻道的升級檔案組

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Different architectures of the same package can exist in a single channel, this may cause a package to be listed twice for a given channel.
trans-unit.target: 注意：不同架構的同樣套件會存在於同樣的單一頻道，這可能會導致套件在 同一個頻道中被列出兩次。
